file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-18-06 - LATERAL WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LATERAL WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of lateral wing-to-fuselage fairing for general condition. B. Related Zones: 194/195. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 13601.0 thru STA X = 16783.5. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 11595.0 thru STA X = 14777.5. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LATERAL WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING ALL 05-30-18-200-801-A - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPEC- TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-18 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-18-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LATERAL WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do the internal general visual inspection (GVI) of lateral wing- to-fuselage fairing, at zones 194/195, within a touching distance of the items examined. (2) The function of the internal general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - LATERAL WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - REMOV- AMM TASK 53-04-20-000-801-A/400 AL LATERAL WING-TO-FUSELAGE FAIRING - INSTAL- AMM TASK 53-04-20-400-801-A/400 LATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 194 194ER Lateral wing-to-fuselage fairing 195 195EL Lateral wing-to-fuselage fairing D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Flashlight To make the inspection of the area easier E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lateral wing-to-fuselage fairing EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-18 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the lateral wing-to-fuselage fairing 194ER and 195EL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) ( AMM TASK 53-04-20-000-801-A/400). J. Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the interior of the zone for loose screws, washers, connections, skin deformation, nicks, cracks, dents, delaminations, sealant condition, scratches, erosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 601). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the lateral wing-to-fuselage fairing 194ER and 195EL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) ( AMM TASK 53-04-20-400-801-A/400).
